scripts.api: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js
scripts.staging: npm update cmx-components && NODE_ENV=staging npm run build && NODE_ENV=staging pm2 restart kmartinezmedia.com-staging --update-env
scripts.staging:local: npm update cmx-components && NODE_ENV=staging npm run build && NODE_ENV=staging node server.js
scripts.production: npm update cmx-components && npm update martinez-components && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && NODE_ENV=production pm2 restart kmartinezmedia.com --update-env
scripts.production:local: npm update cmx-components && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && NODE_ENV=production node server.js
